meanings.sent1: The farmer sold cowskins to the leather factory.
meanings.sent2: The cowskins were used to make durable leather goods.
meanings.sent3: The cowskins were so soft, they made the other animals jealous.
meanings.sent4: Her hands felt like cowskins after working in the fields all day.
meanings.sent5: The cowskins had a distinct smell that reminded him of the farm.

meanings.definition: Made from the skin of a cow.
meanings.sent1: She wore a stylish cowskins jacket to the party.
meanings.sent2: The cowskins bag was a popular choice among shoppers.
meanings.sent3: The cowskins shoes made him feel like a cowboy.
meanings.sent4: The room was decorated with cowskins rugs that added a rustic charm.
meanings.sent5: The cowskins chair was both comfortable and elegant.

meanings.sent1: The old book was bound in cowskins for preservation.
meanings.sent2: The antique chest was adorned with intricate cowskins carvings.
meanings.sent3: The cowskins walls of the barn gave it a cozy feel.
meanings.sent4: Her journal was filled with cowskins pages waiting to be filled with stories.
meanings.sent5: The cowskins tablecloth added a touch of country charm to the dining room.
